website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo Yoga Tablet 2's full HD display and unique design are rarities in this price range, making it a great choice for entry-level Android tablets.

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sleek looking tablet, with top quality feel, very responsive also has tempered glass protector already on it of good quality. I shopped for weeks reading all the reviews on the best tablet for me and I'm so glad I came across the Lenovo Yoga 2. Worth all £200. And the battery life is incredible, lasts all day on heavy usage. Plus it takes a 64gb SD card so plenty storage. My best purchase this year.
customer_reviews.author: chantelle flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Great little tablet
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't decide between this and the Yoga 3, but with double the RAM and more favourable reviews, I chose the Yoga 2 8 inch model. Perfect for what I need it for (moderate web browsing, entertainment and a few games). Upgraded itself to Lollipop straight away so don't be put off by the older version in the description. Nice bright screen, really fast and responsive. No issues with charging. Knocks the socks off the Asus Transformer Prime it is replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Good upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, got this to replace to replace my Acer B3A20 10 inch 16gb memory 1gb operating memory The main reason I upgraded was the memory the Acer was good for a budget tablet It was a toss up between the Lenovo and the Amazon HD 10 they both were similar price I preferred the Android operating system on the Lenovo than the Amazons version of Android The Lenovo Yoga 2 is superior in every way 32gb memory, 2gb operating memory, battery life, camera and screen. I like the built in kick stand On the down side is the shape of the Lenovo the case's are few and far between
customer_reviews.author: alexi

customer_reviews.title: The Yoga Tablet2 8" is well made and works great at a fantastic price (25% of the equivalent Apple product)
customer_reviews.text: Ok so far, USB charger lead was faulty, but I had another spare which worked Ok. I find it difficult to use the on screen keyboard, as I normally use a desktop PC - have ordered a Bluetooth matching keyboard. I am not used to the operating system as I normally use Windows, but that is something I have to accept. The Tablet is well made and works great. Picture quality & sound 5*. One problem - it can use the internet with a SIM card, but cannot be used as a phone (not a problem for me). The unit is small enough to fit in my camera bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Machin

customer_reviews.title: Not your ordinary tablet.... So much better!
customer_reviews.text: I never really saw the appeal of tablets - yes they're a screen you can carry around with you, but with phones now being really big I always thought there wasn't much point. Especially as most of the time you have to keep hold of them to do anything otherwise they fall over (and potentially smash) However: The fact that this one stands up on its own is just brilliant! I researched tablets religiously for a week before buying this one and I'm glad I did - if you get ANY tablet, trust my research and get this one. Hands down brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Dyer

customer_reviews.title: The better half loves this device and has been using it ...
customer_reviews.text: The better half loves this device and has been using it everyday since Christmas. It is a fantastic tablet in terms of picture and sound quality. The glass screen and metallic body gives this device an expensive and well made feel. We experienced only one problem - most of the memory (20+gb) was used up as miscellaneous memory and we could not access this to rectify. Once we updated the OS to latest version, the problem disappeared. The children also have this tablet and love it - we have not experienced any memory issues with theirs so might only be related to updating software.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Love it, Love it
customer_reviews.text: As someone else said, Love it, Love it! Many people have already testified to the smooth and powerful operation, the quality finish - and some people have already complained about problems that I can;t see; Netflix runs quickly and smoothly. It takes on a special character once it is in a cover. It has the heft and feel of a hardcover book - especially with the chunky spine, It really is something different - not a faceless clone that could be any other tablet. It has character - and that makes it vert special - especially at this price :)
customer_reviews.author: Phillistein

customer_reviews.title: it was for my 70 year old mother who did not require massive processor speed or the best screen on the market
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because of the budget price, it was for my 70 year old mother who did not require massive processor speed or the best screen on the market. Does everything that most people need and does not seem slow when switching between apps. It is well made and does not feel cheap, the only downside is the battery does not last that long. After just one day of heavy use it will need charging.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me a lenovo yoga tablet for Christmas a few yeas ago and I was so impressed, i bought him this one, forget the ipad or the posh expensive tablets, this is the one to get, I absolutely love it, slim, fast, lots of features and a stand so it can stand alone while you use it, it even has a hole in the stand so you can hang it up, especially if you are using it to follow cooking recipes, would highly recommend, though you will have to hunt around for this model now as they have brought out the yoga 3 and it isn't nearly as good as this one for its spec
customer_reviews.author: D. Park

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant value, quality, speed...buy it
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet. Have had an iPad before and can say with confidence the quality and finish and screen quality are easily as good, and at a much more agreeable price. Excellent speed and usability, good memory and ability for expanding the memory (unlike an iPad), lots of available fun and useful Apps. Nice quality finish. Handy, versatile, built in stand which can be used in many positions. The only thing I find a touch awkward is the handgrip which isn't comfortable but for me but from what I've read is not a problem for most and is not any reason considering all the pluses this tablet has, to decide not to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: JoGo

customer_reviews.title: The speakers and the battery life are what drew me to this tablet, the stand is a real bonus.
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet. Battery life is very good. The built in stand is excellent. It operates very smoothly. The front facing speakers are great. The speakers and the battery life are what drew me to this tablet. I actually wanted a more expensive make but the stand, speakers and battery life kept brining me back to this. Months later and I'm still very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Neo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but uses a lot of power on standby
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet GOOD It seems to be good quality The screen is clear It seems quite fast Updates to Android 5.0.1 The stand is very useful - with a Bluetooth keyboard it can be like having a micro PC Bad Supplied with android 4. . . . - would be 5 * if not for this issue Battery does not last - uses a lot of power on standby - investigating now It takes a long time to charge
customer_reviews.author: Ian WWW

customer_reviews.title: Faulty after 2 days.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and when it first arrived it was great looking with a really clever hinge mechanism. Unfortunately, two days later, it just stopped working and I had to send it back. Ordered a Samsung Tab instead.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: love my new lLenovo
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for my last Lenovo that I accidentally dropped it didn't bounce . I bought another because I like the size and I am used to it would recommend I am 64 and not very up on technology but found this product easy to set up and use.Good delivery ordered Wednesday night delivered 9am Friday morning by a very cheerful driver .
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bannister

customer_reviews.title: Bought this tablet about 4 months ago but after using ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tablet about 4 months ago but after using for a few weeks started to have some issues with it. Firstly I couldn't get it to recognise my 64Gb Samsung sd card, it would randomly unmount the card and not mount it again without a reboot. This happens every time it's running. After loading it with apps I have found the the device has become incredibly laggy at times, especially on low battery. It can take over 5 minutes to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Davies

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet...got it for a great price...but dont expect the advertised battery life
customer_reviews.text: Build quality and working if great; especially since I got it while on sale. However battery life isnt as great as advertised (or indeed as reviewed). I only get 24+ hrs if I dont actually use it at all :-) Normal use (normal games, news and browsing, kindle etc.) battery runs down in < 1 day...could be the Android upgrade but that does downgrade this by a star
customer_reviews.author: Kartik P

customer_reviews.title: Still like it though and as I saw a video on ...
customer_reviews.text: Had the Yoga 8 and thought it was fabulous except for the battery degradation at around 12 months. Barely charges or holds a charge now. Still like it though and as I saw a video on how to replace the Yoga 2 battery I thought I should upgrade. Better quality screen and better speaker quality. A win, win. Just hope I can get a replacement battery when needed. Only issue I have found in this one is that the battery is only lasting 8 hours. Saw somewhere else that someone played with the settings and got the promised 18 hours. ( I didn't have that particular issue with the first Yoga Tablet though).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet for value.
customer_reviews.text: Really good for the money. The only reason for the 4 star is because the left speaker gets really distorted anything past half way loud, I even got a replacement tablet but it was exactly the same and the build quality is mediocre. Other than that, it really is good, everything runs fine, no stutters really smooth, never crashes, runs any graphically intense game with ease and most of all the BATTERY LIFE Is amazing, slap any other tablet in the face and then slaps them again. Lol. You seriously can not go wrong for so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Dawton

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy I have made for years
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet, and I was lucky enough to buy it when it was £159 just after Xmas. I ordered a nice white case for it off of here and it fits just right amongst my books on my bookshelf. Great picture/screen quality and the speakers give out a great sound. I like to stream UTube on to my TV with it. I would recommend this if you can't afford an IPad as I think it is an equal product.
customer_reviews.author: T. M. Fry

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo Yoga 2
customer_reviews.text: Service was great, as is the tablet, but I should have bought the Windows version rather than the Android, as I personally would have preferred the windows option. However generally the Android version works well enough. I don't like the Android email system, it downloads ok, but doesn't work well with Pop3 email accounts. The emails often disappear after a few days, and I have yet to find out how to stop it happening. Other than that it is good.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Compared to Yoga 3
customer_reviews.text: Just buy it if there is still stock available. Why you need to buy this and not yoga 3? 1. Yoga 3 model does not look as solid as this one. 2. This has got a 2 GB RAM. When it comes to day to day operation RAM is more important than the processor power. Because there is only so processing a app would need. But when you run lot of app simultaneously which you will RAM would come for the rescue. 3. This has 32 Gigs of space. Lots of songs and movie. 4. Sounds excellent and honestly atmos and dolby doesnt make much difference in a TAB
customer_reviews.author: Ramki

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy Lenovo. Cheap product and appalling after sales service!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good tablet. Mine is defective and the screen blacks out on a regular basis. The charging cable also keeps on dropping out of the tablet instead of attaching securely as it should. Lenovo's after sales assistant is virtually non-existent and the assistants I have dealt with just waste time asking you to try a long list of things to resolve the problem, rather than accepting that the product is just faulty and needs replacing. I wouldn't recommend this tablet or Lenovo to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Great little tablet that has stood the test of time
customer_reviews.text: Great little tablet that has stood the test of time, had this for nearly 2 years and still going strong, cant fault this tablet, but would recommend that you install apps to sd card as loading up preinstalled memory can slow things down.
customer_reviews.author: Scotsman

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo excellent make
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item as it didn't work exactly as it should (The screen didn't rotate as it should of), that being said it was well built and when it did work it was very good, speedy and battery life amazing also the volume was the loudest I have heard ever.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: Good screen and for just casual surfing and for vids
customer_reviews.text: This tablet for the price id say its OK if your not looking for a fast device. But the screen is beautiful full of colour its a IPS display so its really vivid. The specs aren't that great but if you have a hand full of apps and just surf around watch videos then its perfect. The battery lasts depending on the user but it can last up to 2-3 days if your a decent user.
customer_reviews.author: EMKAS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet arrived fast, advertised as new from a private seller. Light, thin, fast and charges within 6 hours from dead. Downloads to new android version straight away. Easy to connect to the internet, and can be used from different angles, even hanging on a wall. Buy a Lonovo they are sleak and modern.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Wootton

customer_reviews.title: Poor charger
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tablet, it does exactly what I need and is nice and quick. Lovely screen as well. The reason for four stars is the charger, it's not good. I left it on charge all night and in the morning it still had 1 day and 2 hours left for a full charge. Luckily I have another 2amp charger which charged it fine. I didn't think this was an issue I should return the tablet for though. The tablet is quite slow to charge, but to be fair it has a large battery and is no worse than other tablets I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Col

customer_reviews.title: very good tablet, fast and responsive.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Impressive tablet. Fast responsive, not sluggish like other tablets I've used. Easy to use, with a crystal clear screen & good sound. Very pleased after I swapped my Asus zen for this and the lenovo is a million miles better.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. A. DEWITT

customer_reviews.title: Good basic tablet
customer_reviews.text: Nice screen, good interface and decent sound. useful built in stand - terrible light detection brightness control (turned this function off) Used daily for social media and surfing the web. Can't comment on games as that's not my thing. Had no issues 2015 - I'm sure the technology will be outdated soon - as with all tech.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it just for the practical stand
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work as well as an iPad (less responsive and slower), but there again you don't have to put up with Apple and its ludicrous eco-system. Can't seem to load Adobe flashPlayer so can't watch much video on it. And it's a bit heavy to use for a long time. But the stand is fantastic when you want to browse whilst you have breakfast!
customer_reviews.author: HappySmile

customer_reviews.title: Lovely tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love Lenovo products, they are robust and good quality , however this is the second unit as my first delivery was old stock and faulty. How do I know it was old stock? It needed too many updates to bring it up to current, where as this new one only needed one update. Lenovo have put a lot of thought into these units and I do like this yoga2 after using the yoga1 for 18 months
customer_reviews.author: Telford man

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo YOGA 2 8 inch Tablet (Silver) - (Intel Atom Z3745 1.33GHz, 2GB RAM,...
customer_reviews.text: Superb tablet without doubt, had this since October and I like it a lot, the battery life is amazingly good, even when using it as a Sat-Nav, GPS on this machine is far more accurate than TomTom, Good gamer, plenty of power, brilliant screen, the flip-out stand is ingenious, A Big plus the battery charges within a couple of hours. Got loads of storage, Get one.
customer_reviews.author: Les W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for 6 months now.My business machine, tv, laptop rolled into one. With lte goes everywhere and stays connected. Excellent screen, very good Dolby sound, able to disable any bloatware. Camera works well and battery lasts. You could spend more but why. A fantastic 8"tablet
customer_reviews.author: stephen reid

customer_reviews.title: Delighted !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my old i-pad, a little disappointed at first with the poor touch response on screen but a system update resolved the issue. The display and sound is much better than the i-pad, the performance and battery life are really good. Thirty two GB is ample but at least you get the option to expand if needed. Terrific value with the Lenovo cash back deal works out to be a third of the cost of it's predecessor. Delighted
customer_reviews.author: John Binns

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great screen, and great value for money. Although it is heavier than the average Samsung it's not too heavy and the round part provides a really comfortable handle. The stand is a brilliant addition and with a Bluetooth keyboard it's very versatile. I highly recommend it, especially on an Amazon warehouse deal.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Steer well clear!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. The screen has a design flaw. When my daughter aged 14 pulled out the back stand, the screen cracked. She had only had it for 2weeks! Manufacturer says warranty not covered for physical damage. I will take this up with Amazon, but would strongly advise NOT to buy this tablet. My son's both got the new 10 inch kindle fire HD's for Christmas, these tablets are far superior and cheaper than the Lenova.
customer_reviews.author: Daboo

customer_reviews.title: Good but .......
customer_reviews.text: I hate Apple so this was a good compromise Downloading movies from laptop produced a cracking sound - poor information from Lenovo help site to rectify I downloaded an app called VLC media player which rectified the problem
customer_reviews.author: Mr. K. A. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant piece of kit.
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of this tablet. I purchased it for my mum who isn't very technology literate. She loved the backstand to watch her TV shows while she does other things - no need for a bulky case to keep it up. It's very fast and being android has tons of apps and is compatible with almost everything.
customer_reviews.author: KingoftheAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to use. Kinda weird that all app icons **have* to be displayed on the home screens unless you want to uninstall them, but overall the tablet works well.
customer_reviews.author: Corellon Larethian

customer_reviews.title: Yoga is good for your soul 2
customer_reviews.text: Love this lil tab. Went fire the 8' version add I'm all for portability. It have good battery life, superb full 1080p resolution screen & excellent speakers. Comes with a pure installed Dolby app that you cannot get anywhere else....never ever uninstall this app ever, it's vital! Al in all an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. D. O'neill

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me as my Xmas present. I am very pleased with it. I will be using it mainly for my emails and photographs. I only have 2small complaints, one is that I would prefer it to be a bit quicker and the other is that the user guide is not at all comprehensive.
customer_reviews.author: dummysgirl

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a month as an upgrade from my Tesco hudl. Lovely sound and picture but can't stop it from always opening on camera. My adult children have looked at it but to no avail. This is a minor bug and can be put up with. On the whole I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Try to use it but after few weeks something went wrong. Try to change few times but always the same failure. Refund
customer_reviews.author: Davide Fattore

customer_reviews.title: He's delighted with it
customer_reviews.text: The Lenovo Yoga was bought as a birthday gift for hubby. He's delighted with it. Excellent sound,good HD screen,fast.Better than the other 2 tablets (well known brands). Brilliant idea having a stand incorporated as it makes ease of use and yet still a pad. Great little item,delighted.
customer_reviews.author: jay ashman

customer_reviews.title: Cannot stress enough how good this tablet is
customer_reviews.text: Cannot stress enough how good this tablet is, the build is incrdibly stong, the kick stand is easily mobile and not clunky at all or even too loose, in terms of specs it is excellent for viewing TV and movies and is very quick and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Eden Stearn

customer_reviews.title: Some problems
customer_reviews.text: Lovely styling. had a few problems with my first one so sent it back and received a replacement. Had that for six months and had more problems in that it crashed and would not start again. Sent back to Lenovo/Medion for repair and have just received it back, hope it lasts this time.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Hollands

customer_reviews.title: Serious fault developed after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks the tablet started randomly freezing and crashing. If left on overnight it intermittently buzzes which is not great if trying to sleep, and it is inconvenient to turn it off just in case. The build quality is great, but there are obviously serious glitches in the device. Overall, I'm very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Towlson

customer_reviews.title: arrived promptly and really easy to use gift for my partner and he loves ...
customer_reviews.text: arrived promptly and really easy to use gift for my partner and he loves it great display, colour, pixels, brightness all fab
customer_reviews.author: Vbaines21

customer_reviews.title: good choice
customer_reviews.text: cant fault it as a used buy but should have read the details first regarding what came in the package
customer_reviews.author: conrad jones

customer_reviews.title: What a beauty!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is gorgeous. Lovely and streamlined and the flip out stand is genius. I can use it whichever way round and find everything easy to use. I was able to connect up all my accounts easily and set up was smooth. Currently filling the 16Gb memory with many awesome apps! My next purchase will probably be a lnovo tablet case as traditional tablet cases won't fit. That's the only bad side, but it was my choice to get this product fully aware of its difference in shape and size and likelihood that traditional tablet cases wouldn't fit. All in all very much worth te price I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes but not met
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the software and the speed of navigating around the older android operating system left me a little disappointed. The functionality of the stand and long battery life were really good though. I eventually returned the tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Owais

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best tablet I ever had. Was an upgrade from a Samsung. Very fast web browsing great battery life also very handy the closeable stand. Since I have it ordered another one for my gf. Both works great. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chubby

customer_reviews.title: One month into the Lenovo and it works like a dream Time will tell if or how long ...
customer_reviews.text: One month into the Lenovo and it works like a dream Time will tell if or how long it will continue. It lives up to my high expectations. Cannot be faulted at the moment
customer_reviews.author: K. Alred

customer_reviews.title: Worse customer service ever
customer_reviews.text: Update: The tablet doesn't work anymore and the customer service of Lenovo is a nighmare, nobody seems to reply to my questions. I would advice don't buy any Lenovo products.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Mula Vivero

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo Yoga 2 10.1"
customer_reviews.text: I previously had the 8 inch version which I thought was pretty good but this model with the Intel Atom processor is way better. Only had it for 4 days but so far so good. Bought it from Amazon warehouse deal at £138.80 but 4 days later it is £128.43, grrr, 😬 just my luck. Still a good deal. Beautiful bright display. Would recommend you download Nova Launcher. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jacko78

customer_reviews.title: No where near as good as the Yoga 1
customer_reviews.text: No where near as good as the Yoga 1. It's supposed to be a faster processor and better screen. I think this just kills the battery. It lasts around 2 days with occasional use. The Yoga 1 lasted all week. The original had a much nicer shape too.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Murray

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design. I like how sleek and thin it ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design. I like how sleek and thin it looks with the integrated stand. High quality & performance tablet. Love it all around!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: The wifi works well and the expandable storage is useful. It is well built and I expect it ...
customer_reviews.text: This Android tablet has a good-looking, high resolution screen. It is responsive and has more than enough horse-power for the moderately graphics-intensive games my family play on it. The wifi works well and the expandable storage is useful. It is well built and I expect it to last.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Pincher

customer_reviews.title: Ideal all rounder
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item. I'd shopped around a lot before purchasing and did my research, for the price and specification, this is a winner. For games, watching films and general browsing of Internet/emails, it exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Love this tablet - it is great
customer_reviews.text: I really really love love love this tablet - took it on holiday - kept up to date with emails, ordered a couple of things, had the radiio on. Great sound, seems robust with the stand and something to hold on to. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: but overall I wouild recommended this to a friend
customer_reviews.text: This battery life is not as long as my previous tablet, but overall I wouild recommended this to a friend. Better technology and much more user friendly.not used the camera yet but muych better sound and picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nubian Man

customer_reviews.title: I don't use it as it is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Awful tablet, I don't use it as it is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine

customer_reviews.title: A good functional tablet
customer_reviews.text: I like the look feel and utility of this tablet. In fact it fully meets my requirements, including update to Android 5.01. A bit heavy, perhaps a battery with higher power to weight ratio will solve that. Also the File structure looks a bit more complicated than necessary. On the whole a superb bit of personal electronics. My score lies btwn 4 & 5
customer_reviews.author: enQuirer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet film pleasant to watch the allround sound very ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet film pleasant to watch the allround sound very good .good repronse time a joy to use allso very good battery life
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value all round tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great value all round tablet. I cannot understand why someone would spend two to three times its price for basically the same functionality
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone poet

customer_reviews.title: Top Buy
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant tablet bought it to replace my wife's Hudl 2. She loves the long battery life , the large display and the adjustable stand .
customer_reviews.author: billsk

customer_reviews.title: I love this it is everything I wanted and more
customer_reviews.text: I love this it is everything I wanted and more, never owned a smart phone or tablet before, once I got used to the touch screen it is great
customer_reviews.author: Carole Ranjbar

customer_reviews.title: Decent but could be better
customer_reviews.text: The lenovo yoga tablet2 is good but i had to upgrade to the lenovo yoga tablet 3 pro, its £189 more but its quicker ,sharper, more usable and it has a projector which is just amazing i use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Best 8" tablet I have found even better than Samsung!
customer_reviews.text: Fast, easy to use, updated without no problem. Lenovo at their best. Quirky design but surprisingly comfortable to use for reading. and.....the battery life is stupendous.
customer_reviews.author: TAC45

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my hubby for our wedding anniversay. He loves it. So I am more than happy
customer_reviews.author: Hms07

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy for good battery life
customer_reviews.text: Bought for it's supposedly long battery life - not to do anything fancy. The claim Lenovo makes for how long the battery lasts is extraordinarily optimistic.
customer_reviews.author: N H

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise I love it. It's responsive
customer_reviews.text: A bit heavy, but otherwise I love it. It's responsive, fast, dynamic, and the screen is good. The design is unorthodox and a little ugly, but the stand is surprisingly useful and you can also hold the battery pack like the side of a book while you're reading. Overall, very happy. Will be even more happy if Lenovo unlock the bootloader so we can all custom Rom it. :D
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Richard P. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Great budget tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built, nice looking & practicable piece of tech on a budget for those looking for a tablet with an eye for excellent battery life. Good sound quality & even better screen resolution with the wide viewing angle of a more expensive brand. I.e. No colour bleed or fading at extreme angles.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely superb. Extremely well made, nice stainless steel finish, great facilities with perfect touch screen, top notch speakers with plenty of level and great battery life. Can't fault it.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant tablet
customer_reviews.text: So far brilliant only had a week but great. Its slim line and so easy to hold and use. Fantastic design. The sound is great compared to other tablets and very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: ROAD.K

customer_reviews.title: ... for money well made and very quick and a great screen.
customer_reviews.text: Value for money well made and very quick and a great screen......haven't tried it out in the sunny climate yet...Fires up very quickly so its every thing I want, and internet shopping is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeTy

customer_reviews.title: lenovo for me!!
customer_reviews.text: This is well worth the money, especially since buying the Bluetooth, case/keyboard I love it so much, it even goes to bed with me! Photos are amazing, setting up is simple? "has to be for me to work it" I would recommend this to anybody whether they are professionals or near novices like me, Well done Lenovo!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharone

customer_reviews.title: The stand that comes with the Yoga model is very practical and highly useful. I am very much satisfied with the product ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Yoga II tablet for more than a week. I am thoroughly impressed with the screen resolution and audio quality. The stand that comes with the Yoga model is very practical and highly useful. I am very much satisfied with the product as a whole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not support 64GBP card
customer_reviews.text: This tablet does not support 64gb micro sd.It does not support exfat or ntfs which cards over 32GBP are formatted to.It only supports fat32 so you can't put anything over a 4gb file size on the card.I purchased two of these tablets and both of them don't support 64gb cards.
customer_reviews.author: MR A L MARSHALL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: By victor this is a great tablet not the cheap you buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet with great price
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet with great price. Updated to Android 5.0, speakers are amazing. Games run smoothly (I did not expect this from Intel mobile CPU and graphics frankly, so it was nice surprise).
customer_reviews.author: Budyoni D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price unless you really want flash
customer_reviews.text: Feels generally good quality. Battery life is good as is the sound quality for a tablet. The kickstand feature is proving handy. So far the only problem I've had is the lack of flash capability.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tablet
customer_reviews.text: Very distinctive design makes my other tablets look ancient. Very good in all respects and would highly recommend this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Aybee

customer_reviews.title: good screen, upgraded to lollypop 5 the following day
customer_reviews.text: Worked as it should, good screen, upgraded to lollypop 5 the following day, working fine so far only had it a week.
customer_reviews.author: MR HANS J H FOITH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: better than the the big names at a good price
customer_reviews.author: Mojo 1945

customer_reviews.title: After a year of daily usage
customer_reviews.text: Great FHD screen, battery life and kickstand. Still gets android updates from Lenovo. Probably best tablet for media consumption.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gift for the wife she loves it uses it for FB/ Twitter / tv catch up and games
customer_reviews.author: DAZWALKINGMAN

customer_reviews.title: I m not sure if that is just my item ...
customer_reviews.text: I m not sure if that is just my item but it is just awful. Freezes and restarts itself all the time. Expected more from Lenovo.
customer_reviews.author: Mila G

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife's birthday, and five months on she has never put it down, oh well, conversation is overrated anyway..lol
customer_reviews.author: guy

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo Tab was delivered on time, however the screen ...
customer_reviews.text: Lenovo Tab was delivered on time, however the screen goes in to hibernate mode quite often while in use and the only way to get back is by using the power button. Is this an Lollipop (5.0.1) upgrade issue?
customer_reviews.author: ajay

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a birthday present for my neice ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday present for my neice. After a month it wouldn't charge properly. Very dissapointed as I've had lenovo tablets before and have had no problems
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice graphics, speed
customer_reviews.text: Ideal size for me, nice graphics, speed, quality feel, I would recommend it. After some use I would like to add the battery charge depletion is quite quick.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jj Hartness

customer_reviews.title: Solid tablet with long lasting battery
customer_reviews.text: Only issue I had its a shape of the tablet. There is surprisingly small number of covers that will fit properly. Therefore only 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: iks

customer_reviews.title: good customer care
customer_reviews.text: I got replaced the firstone...it didnt work...but i have to say that dealing with seller was superb. My tablet was replaced within week and new tablet is spotless. Acualy tablet is prety fast... thanx
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can't fault this tablet & it ticks all the right boxes!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Excellent quality and does all that it should & more! Beautiful piece of engineering! So pleased I chose this Android tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S C M Greig

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good tablet but after updating to Lollipop battery discharges too fast. It's not expected update to Marshmallow.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet. Really solid device. Smooth interface, great screen, superb sound and excellent battery life.
customer_reviews.author: DaveyP

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Was umming and aw-ing for ages before purchase. My only gripe was that its very hard to work out which Yoga Tab is the latest model. If anyone knows what 64gb memory card this thing takes, I would appreciate the knowledge! Otherwise this is an exceptional machine, great battery life, great display and its just plain cool bit ok kit.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because of the battery life claims
customer_reviews.text: Good tablet but the strength and durability of the battery is greatly over exaggerated. I've had two other tablets and the battery on this one is no better.
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Recommend you look into better quality products
customer_reviews.text: It was ok while it was working. Had to send it to repair once after only 3 months of usage. Recommend you look into better quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Pawel Zukowski

product_meta.title: Lenovo YOGA 2 8 inch Tablet (Silver) - (Intel Atom Z3745 1.86 GHz, 2 GB LP-DDR3 RAM, 16 GB EMMC Memory, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, LTE, GPS, 8 MP (Rear), 1.6 MP HD (Front) Camera, Android 4.4)
product_meta.description:
Size Name:8-inch, 16 GB| Style Name:LTE

LENOVO YOGA TABLET 2 8-INCH
A TABLET THAT ADAPTS TO YOU 
The Lenovo YOGA Tablet 2 8-inch adapts to you, with a kickstand that provides four ways to enjoy media content - read, watch, browse or hang. However you use yours, you’ll find four more reasons to love it: up to 18 hours of battery life, twin large-capacity speakers, smart processing power that adapts to what you are doing, and a fast LTE mobile data connection.

The Lenovo YOGA Tablet 2 8-inch is for those seeking a versatile full-function tablet for work and play. It is ideal for people who enjoy multimedia, games, browsing, socialising or who need a tablet with anytime, anywhere connectivity. 

AT A GLANCE
 * 8-inch (1920x1200) IPS display
 *  Intel Atom Processor Z3745 (2M cache, four cores, up to 1.86 GHz) 
 *  Twin large chamber front speakers with Dolby Audio 
 *  2 GB LPDDR3 (64-bit) RAM +16 GB EMMC storage + 64 GB expandable with Micro SD 
 *  8 MP AF rear/1.6 MP FF front cameras 
 *  Dual band, 802.11a/b/g/n Wi-Fi 
 *  4G LTE CAT 4
 *  Android 4.4 Kitkat
 * Ports: Micro USB (OTG), 3.5 mm audio jack 

ADAPTS TO ALL YOU DO WITH YOUR TABLET
Read, watch, browse or hang - this four-way versatility lets YOGA Tablet 2 adapt to your lifestyle for viewing, reading, sharing, listening, browsing and chatting. 

CHOOSE YOUR MODE:
Read

Watch

Browse

Hang


Rotates nearly 180° to make hang. Hang around the kitchen, bedroom, gym, train, plane, office: anywhere with a hook BATTERY LIFE
With up to 18 hours on a single charge, the battery life enables not just multitasking but also gives you the freedom to charge other devices too.

AUDIO
Enjoy deep bass and loud audio with enlarged twin front speakers, Dolby Audio surround and Wolfson Master Hi-Fi noise reduction.

PERFORMANCE FOR WORK AND PLAY WITH INTEL INSIDE
 Wake in a flash, quickly open files and photos and seamlessly switch between apps without delay. Quad-Core with Intel Burst technology dynamically matches processing power depending on what you are doing with your YOGA to maximise battery life and still have the power to get things done.

FAST MOBILE DATA CONNECTIONS AND DUAL-BAND WI-FI
Anytime, anywhere access to your friends and the web with super-fast LTE connectivity. Supports 4G LTE for ultra-fast mobile data and dual band Wi-Fi for stable connections over larger distances. 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz dual bands give more stable connections specially over. Also supports Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n 

 8 MP REAR CAMERA
Sharper photography with an 8 MP rear camera with f2.2 wide-aperture lens and a 1.6 MP HD front camera. The f2.2 wide aperture lens is designed to allow more light to reach the camera sensor, ideal for making better images, especially in dark conditions. Glare reducing enhanced blue calcium oxide glass gives more lifelike colour, reducing flare and ghost around bright lights. Also, the BSI-2 Sensor's pixel detection area is ideal for giving crisp images 

POWERED BY THE INTEL ATOM PROCESSOR
Tablets featuring the Intel Atom processor are power-optimised for better performance and energy efficiency, so enjoying the things you like to do has never been easier. Listen, watch, play and be productive on the go.



BOX CONTAINS
Lenovo Tablet
AC Adapter
USB Cable
User Documentation
feature_bullets: Adapts to all you do - 4-way versatility lets the YOGA Tablet 2 adapt to your lifestyle for viewing, reading, sharing, listening, browsing and chatting
Goes All Day - epic battery life enables not just multitasking but also gives you the freedom to charge other devices too
Connected Everywhere - anytime, anywhere access to your friends and the web with super-fast LTE connectivity
Smile for the Camera - a powerful 8MP rear camera lets you capture and share sharper, better photos and videos
